sentences.en: " He's an old friend, " he went on, getting deeper into the mire.
sentences.cn: “ 他是老朋友了, " 他继续说, 越来越深地陷进了泥沼.

sentences.en: Accordingto Preston equation, mathematics model of MIRE is established in this thesis.
sentences.cn: 在研究磁流变抛光机理的基础上,根据光学加工中为人们所普遍接受的Preston方程, 建立了磁流变抛光的数学模型.

sentences.en: But later on Beaucock had fallen into the mire.
sentences.cn: 但是后来,比奥库克陷入了困境.

sentences.en: Don't mire the wheels of a cart.
He found himself in the mire.
sentences.cn: 他发现自己陷入了困境.

sentences.en: He has rescued me from the mire of misery.
sentences.cn: 他把我从苦海里救了出来.

sentences.en: He has run away and landed in the mire.
sentences.cn: 他一小差就开到泥坑里去了.

sentences.en: He would pull himself out of the mire.
I don't want my son's good name dragged through the mire.
sentences.cn: 我不想使我儿子的名誉扫地.

sentences.en: Lure or drag sb. into the mire or wrong doings.
sentences.cn: 引诱某人做坏事或犯错误.

sentences.en: R: unmerciful mire, lick up the most lovely person in the world!
sentences.cn: 罗密欧: 你无情的泥, 吞噬了世上最可爱的人!

sentences.en: She couldn't withstand the lure of money and was dragged into the mire.
sentences.cn: 她经不起金钱的引诱,被拉下水了.

sentences.en: The bus has stuck in the mire.
The wheels got stuck in the mire.
The wheels sank deeper into the mire.
sentences.cn: 轮子在泥潭中陷得更深了。

sentences.en: Trample them in the mire under the German heel.
sentences.cn: 践踏在德国的足下可也.

words.tran_cn: 使陷于泥坑；使陷入困境
